#AnnaKarenina @AbbeyTheatre is a wonderful production. Stellar performances and stunning costumes. Massive Congrats to all! 🦋🎀💛
#RobinHood @gaiety_theatre is fab! Stunning sets, costumes & cast. Smiled from start to finish. Congrats to @davygcrowley & all the team! 💜
#TheHeiress @GateTheatreDub is a stunning production beautifully told. What a luxurious evening. A real treat. Congrats to all 💕👰🏻🤵🏻

@McMahonPhilly Ah thanks so very much lovely man!! xxx
#DrStrange is great fun. Tons of action and plenty of laughs. Defo worth a cinema trip. #MisterDoctor https://t.co/mowm6UzQN5
@annieryanwest Very glamorous! Love it.
Excellent night o comedy @ #OddMollies in Drogheda brilliantly hosted by @joerooney1 w Damo Clarke. Every month. #stags #hens #dogsncats 🤓🙌🏻
Had a lovely time @KerryFilmFest meeting great actors and seeing the beautiful Kingdom. Thanks so much to all. #KFF16 😎👏🏼
Had great fun @ #TheCommitments @BGETheatre tonight. Huge Congrats to all! A v talented bunch on stage & a v happy bunch in th'audience 🙋🏻💜🎤
#Cracks @antainarts is a v insightful piece about mental health. Very emotionally charged performances plus much lightness & humour. 🤓👏🏼
Just home from a week's detox and exercise in the West of Ireland. @RetreatAtCloona is an Irish Treasure. #Cloona #Detox #Bodytonic 🙏🏽🌳🍂🍁☘️🍏
#TheFather @GateTheatreDub and #TheSeagull @gaiety_theatre this week. Two brilliant shows with amazing performances! What a treat. #DTF16
